metadata.name: ART = UTILITY
metadata.description: Utility means different things to different people. For me Art is UTILITY. It is my way of campaigning, it is my way of taking up space, it is my way of processing emotions It is the beginning and the end. It is the purpose and the vision. - It is the utility. I wanted to hold a piece in my wallet that speaks to this, so Iâ€™ve created one.
